about.title: About me
about.text: Hi there ! My name is Antoine GROSJAT and i'm a Junior Web Integrator passionate about creating interactive and aesthetic websites. With a solid training followed at Openclassrooms in 2023/2024 in HTML, CSS and JavaScript, I am dedicated to transforming visual concepts into engaging and functional user experiences.
about.text1: I am passionate about web development and always looking for new opportunities to learn and grow. My goal is to continue to improve my skills, explore new technologies, and contribute to challenging projects that push the boundaries of web design.

projects.title: Kasa
projects.description: Creation of a real estate rental web application with React.
projects.additionalInfo: Kasa est le premier projet React que j'ai réalisé dans le cadre de ma formation d'intégrateur web.
projects.objectives: À partir d'une maquette fournie j'ai réalisé la refonte totale de cette application de location immobilière.
